}catch(error){console.error("Error adding student: ",error);}};// Start editing student

const cancelEdit=()=>{setEditingStudent(null);};// Save edited student

// Reset file input
setCsvFile(null);setCsvFileName('No file selected');}catch(error){console.error("Error importing students: ",error);alert('Error importing students.
